name: YouTube Video Concept
template: Create a detailed video concept for a YouTube video about {query}. Include hook, main content structure, engagement points, and outro with CTA.

name: TikTok/Reels Concept
template: Generate a viral short-form video concept about {query}. Include hook, visual elements, trending sounds, and engagement tactics for maximum reach.

name: Tutorial Video
template: Create a tutorial video plan for {query}. Include step-by-step breakdown, visual demonstrations, tips, and common mistakes to avoid.

name: Product Demo Video
template: Create a product demonstration video plan for {query}. Highlight features, benefits, use cases, and include clear visuals and explanations.

name: Explainer Video
template: Create an explainer video script for {query}. Break down complex ideas into simple, visual explanations with clear narrative flow.

name: Promotional Video
template: Design a promotional video for {query}. Include attention-grabbing opening, key selling points, emotional appeal, and strong call-to-action.

name: Documentary Style Video
template: Create a documentary-style video plan about {query}. Include narrative structure, interview points, B-roll ideas, and storytelling elements.

name: Animation Concept
template: Develop an animation concept for {query}. Include visual style, character designs, key scenes, transitions, and animation techniques.

name: Vlog Structure
template: Create a vlog structure for {query}. Include personal narrative, key moments to capture, transitions, and authentic engagement with audience.

name: Livestream Plan
template: Plan a livestream about {query}. Include talking points, audience interaction ideas, schedule, and engagement strategies for real-time viewers.
